steps.title: Introduction
steps.content: Define the core problem your product solves. A clear problem statement can guide your product development and marketing strategies.

steps.title: Problem Statement
steps.label: Describe the problem your product addresses:
steps.placeholder: E.g., Small businesses struggle to manage inventory efficiently without the right tools.

steps.title: Impact of the Problem
steps.label: How does this problem impact your target customers?
steps.placeholder: E.g., It leads to overstocking, understocking, and lost sales.
